initial_story:
Police have deployed an armoured vehicle to pry open the cabin of a lorry on a motorway in Texas.

The driver refused to stop, or get out of the cab when officers used spike strips to stop the vehicle, police said.

After the armoured vehicle tore open a window, police threw in a gas canister, before going inside and pulling the driver out.

It is unclear what started the chase, but police said the driver used "evasive manoeuvres", changing lanes multiple times and swerving.

“We still don’t know why he was acting in the erratic manner that he was,” Harris County Sheriff Ed Gonzalez told journalists, adding that he appeared to have "some heavy impairment".
stories: The driver was taken into custody and given a sobriety test which he failed. He was charged with reckless driving, evading arrest, and driving under the influence. Police are still investigating the incident and trying to determine if the driver was under the influence of drugs or alcohol. Thankfully, no one was injured during the chase and the situation was brought under control before any further damage could occur.

The driver's reckless actions not only put his own life in danger, but also endangered the lives of innocent bystanders. It is a reminder of the importance of responsible and sober driving to ensure the safety of everyone on the road. Police are urging anyone who may have witnessed the incident to come forward with any information that could help with the investigation. In the meantime, the driver will face serious consequences for his actions, including possible fines, license suspension, and even jail time.

It is crucial for all drivers to understand the consequences of their reckless behavior and the impact it can have on others. By choosing to drive under the influence or engage in dangerous driving habits, individuals are not only putting their own lives at risk, but also jeopardizing the safety of innocent individuals who happen to be on the road. It is a shared responsibility to prioritize safety and make responsible decisions behind the wheel. This incident serves as a stark reminder of the potential dangers of irresponsible driving and the importance of taking the necessary precautions to ensure the well-being of everyone on the road.
